p_1_description: A todo application made using react.js material UI and styled-components.
about_para: My name is Dominik Grudnik, I'm 21 years old and I live near Krakow. I'm studying Computer Science at Politechnika Krakowska in an extramatural mode at the Faculty of WIiT. I am an active person who likes various sports activities and follows the latest IT news.
about_work: Currently, I work as a Full-stack developer, and in my spare time I create all kinds of applications that help me in my daily life and study. I'm open to advancement.
